data.name: Multiverse
data.description:
Multiverse - The Metaverse for the people by the people.
Discover the limitless potential of community created rooms, buildings and even cities! Tired of noisy and invasive social apps? Join a world full of shared positive experiences and spend time with like minded people! From discovering the far reaches of the galaxy in the Planetarium to surviving waves of zombies in Zombietown. Multiverse is full of opportunities to make friends, explore and build the future together.  
Thereâ€™s never been a better time to download and explore the latest technological frontier that is Infiniverse, our huge open world map inhabited and curated by the users and communities of Multiverse. Join the massively successful community driven city developments and be part of establishing the foundation in which the Metaverse will be built on! Stake your claim, build your own personal space, customize it to your liking and connect with other users to showcase your creations! Maybe even become a landowner or sell your real world services in the VR space via a storefront? The possibilities are limited only by your imagination and passion! 
With regular content and improvement updates, Multiverse is rapidly evolving and adapting to the needs of the communities who shape it by providing new features and tools to help them express themselves in the VR space. 
Now is the time to join the VR revolution and become part of the future content creation and browsing.
